actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
House Committee on Foreign Affairs Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 398 - 1 (Record Vote No: 77).

official_title: A resolution expressing the strong support of the House of Representatives for diplomatic efforts to resolve the current crisis in Lebanon and congratulating special envoy Philip C. Habib on his tireless efforts to resolve that crisis.

summary.text: Expresses the support of the House of Representatives for the diplomatic efforts to resolve the current crisis in Lebanon. Encourages the President to pursue a comprehensive and coordinated policy in Lebanon. Congratulates Special Envoy Philip C. Habib on his efforts.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the strong support of the House of Representatives for diplomatic efforts to resolve the current crisis in Lebanon and congratulating special envoy Philip C. Habib on his tireless efforts to resolve that crisis.
